#summary How to install and run SubDownloader on Windows


= Method 1: Installer =

Download and install [http://subdownloader.googlecode.com/files/subdownloader1.2.9.exe Windows Installer 1.2.9]

= Method 2: From sources =

    * Install python 2.5
    * Install wxpython 2.8.3
    * Install imdbpy 2.9
    * Download and uncompress the latest 1.2.9 [http://subdownloader.googlecode.com/files/sources.1.2.9.zip sources]
    * Run Subdownloader.py
